title: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. When running the code provided in tests/new/binaryWarnings, the issue can be observed. Please note that the tests may produce false positives due to filename checking not being enabled in harness verification of messages. It appears that AJDT omits the filename if it makes no sense to AJDT.
EB: In declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars, the source path is listed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main.class'.
SR:
1. Run the code provided in tests/new/binaryWarnings.
2. Observe the source path in the declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars.
